import React, {useState, useRef} from "react"; import "./NavBar.css"; function NavBar() { const [hambtn, setHambtn] = useState(false) const expandMenu = useRef(null); const hamBtn = useRef(null); const expand = () => { setHambtn(!hambtn) const win = window.innerWidth; if (hambtn === true){ expandMenu.current.classList.add("expand"); hamBtn.current.classList.add("close-btn"); }else{ expand.current.classList.remove("expand"); hamBtn.current.classList.remove("close-btn"); } } return (

Paradiso

  • HOME
  • ABOUT
  • CONTACT
  • SHOP
); } export default NavBar;
